mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.NumbersMustBeAggregatedException
mdException.label: Numbers Must Be Aggregated Exception
mdException.message: All number columns must be aggregated. [{numberColumn}] is not aggregated.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.MaxOneGeoColumnException
mdException.label: Max One Geo Column Exception
mdException.message: Query must contain exactly one geo column.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.GeoFieldRequiredException
mdException.label: Geo Field Required Exception
mdException.message: A Geo attribute is required for tracker exporting.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.DHIS2DuplicateAttributeException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Duplicate Attribute Exception
mdException.message: Attributes [{dhis2Attrs}] already exist in DHIS2 as a TrackedEntityAttribute. You can: rename your Geoprism attribute(s), or delete your Geoprism dataset and reimport your spreadsheet with a different attribute name, or delete the attribute(s) in DHIS2.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.OAuthLoginRequiredException
mdException.label: OAuth Login Required Exception
mdException.message: You must log in via OAuth to use this feature. Log out, click the 'Log in with DHIS2' button in the top left, and try your operation again.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.DHIS2EmptyDatasetException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Empty Dataset Exception
mdException.message: Your dataset does not contain any data. It has not been exported.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.DHIS2AttributeLengthException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Attribute Length Exception
mdException.message: One of your attributes is too long. DHIS2 has an attribute name length of 50, your attribute is of length [{attrLen}].

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.etl.dhis2.response.DHIS2DuplicateDataException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Duplicate Data Exception
mdException.message: A DHIS2 [{dataType}] already exists with the {propertyName} [{propertyValue}]
